name: quote
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Quote endpoint is an efficient method to retrieve the latest quote of the selected instrument.

symbol.description:
Instrument symbol, can be any equity, index, ETF, forex or cryptocurrency
E.g. `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`, ...

interval.description: Time interval between data points. Supported values are `1min`, `5min`, `15min`, `30min`, `45min`, `1h`, `2h`, `4h`, `1day`, `1week`, `1month`.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to retrieve. Defaults to 30.

format.description: The format of the response. Can be 'csv' or 'json'. Defaults to 'json'.
